posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jason L
Anyone interested in avoiding Ebay's escalating fees?!

I am looking for a a T206 Hal Chase, Pink portrait.

My only requirements:
it's real
it presents really really nicely

I probably can't pay for anything above a PSA3/SGC40, unless you're feeling charitable.

it can be trimmed, 
it can be raw (if from a well-known Board member), or it can be slabbed by either PSA or SGC

feel free to send me scans and asking prices
thanks
Jason
